title: Looking for Coaching Staff, Royal Club
body:
Greetings,

Looking for a coach who can offer support for a high level team.
1. Record and analyse vods.
2. Team meetings.
3. Ability to aid player development.
4. Competent Drafting

We are an eSports team who pride ourselves on development and success.

Contact by,
email @ (mitchell.jarnicki1@gmail.com)
In game (Princè) accent e alt code
ALT 0232

King Regards,
Prince
